sentences.english: The study used self-regulatory cycle to build the Self-regulated learning doctrine in WebQuest Learning system.
sentences.chinese: 开发具自律学习辅助机制之网路探究学习系统。

sentences.english: Diligence and discipline can reduce the incidence of these errors to near zero.
sentences.chinese: 勤奋和自律可以让这些错误造成的影响降至最低限度。

sentences.english: The pertinent self-disciplinary organizations shall conduct self-disciplinary administration on the introduction business in pursuance of the law.
sentences.chinese: 相关自律性构造依法对介绍营业勾当履行自律管理。

sentences.english: The pertinent self-disciplinary organizations shall conduct self-disciplinary administration on the introduction business in pursuance of the law.
sentences.chinese: 相关自律性构造依法对介绍营业勾当履行自律管理。

sentences.english: I also need to develop self-discipline.
sentences.chinese: 我同样需要发展一些自律。

sentences.english: The first chapter, the author analyzed Chen Kaige's movie artistic autonomy.
sentences.chinese: 第一章论述陈凯歌电影艺术自律主导场域的确立。

sentences.english: Dancing on the other hand, requires diligence and self-discipline.
sentences.chinese: 而且，学舞蹈需要勤奋和自律。

sentences.english: My parents tell me the bad effect, I realize I need to behave myself.
sentences.chinese: 我的父母给了讲了不好的影响，我意识到我该自律。

sentences.english: They prefer to discipline themselves rather than to be disciplined by others.
sentences.chinese: 他们喜欢自律而不喜欢受制于人。

sentences.english: Now primarily stepping up the lawmaking work, doing well the profession self-discipline, enhancing the network custody.
sentences.chinese: 主要是加快立法工作，做好行业自律，加强网络监管。

sentences.english: In the mean time, it must be done to strengthen self-discipline in advertising business and the social supervision.
sentences.chinese: 同时还必须加强广告业自律和广告的社会监督。

sentences.english: To want to scream obscenities, but to wiser and more disciplined than that.
sentences.chinese: 想要张狂地尖叫，但是智慧和自律总会将之代替。

sentences.english: At the White House, I had to become more disciplined.
sentences.chinese: 但到了白宫，我要更加自律。

sentences.english: Self-discipline is one of many personal development tools available to you.
sentences.chinese: 自律是许多自我能力发展工具中的一种。

sentences.english: We can't count all on self-discipline in managing road traffic.
sentences.chinese: 我们并不能全靠自律来管理道路交通。

sentences.english: The answer, in my opinion, is your values and self-discipline .
sentences.chinese: 答案，在我看来，你的价值观念和自律。

definition: to examine oneself/to reflect on one's shortcomings/introspection/self-awareness/self-criticism
self-respect/self-love/self-regard/regard for oneself/to cherish one's good name/to take good care of one's health
to work/to handle matters/to have a job
to make progress/to do better/fig. ambitious to improve oneself/to move forwards
to preserve a proper behavior in private life
